description: Creates a Zero-ETL integration in the caller's account between two resources with Amazon Resource Names (ARNs): the SourceArn and TargetArn.

parameters.name: IntegrationName
parameters.description: A unique name for an integration in Glue.

parameters.name: SourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the source resource for the integration.

parameters.name: TargetArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the target resource for the integration.

parameters.name: AdditionalEncryptionContext
parameters.description: An optional set of non-secret key---value pairs that contains additional contextual information for encryption. This can only be provided if KMSKeyId is provided. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Metadata assigned to the resource consisting of a list of key-value pairs. (dict) --- The Tag object represents a label that you can assign to an Amazon Web Services resource. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define. For more information about tags, and controlling access to resources in Glue, see Amazon Web Services Tags in Glue and Specifying Glue Resource ARNs in the developer guide. key (string) --- The tag key. The key is required when you create a tag on an object. The key is case-sensitive, and must not contain the prefix aws. value (string) --- The tag value. The value is optional when you create a tag on an object. The value is case-sensitive, and must not contain the prefix aws.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The tag key. The key is required when you create a tag on an object. The key is case-sensitive, and must not contain the prefix aws.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The tag value. The value is optional when you create a tag on an object. The value is case-sensitive, and must not contain the prefix aws.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the source resource for the integration.

nested_items.name: TargetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target resource for the integration.

nested_items.name: IntegrationName
nested_items.description: A unique name for an integration in Glue.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the integration.

nested_items.name: IntegrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the created integration.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ARN of a KMS key used for encrypting the channel.

nested_items.name: AdditionalEncryptionContext
nested_items.description: An optional set of non-secret key---value pairs that contains additional contextual information for encryption.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Metadata assigned to the resource consisting of a list of key-value pairs.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The tag key. The key is required when you create a tag on an object. The key is case-sensitive, and must not contain the prefix aws.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The tag value. The value is optional when you create a tag on an object. The value is case-sensitive, and must not contain the prefix aws.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the integration being created.
CREATING: The integration is being created.
ACTIVE: The integration creation succeeds.
MODIFYING: The integration is being modified.
FAILED: The integration creation fails.
DELETING: The integration is deleted.
SYNCING: The integration is synchronizing.
NEEDS_ATTENTION: The integration needs attention, such as synchronization.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the integration was created, in UTC.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of errors associated with the integration creation.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with this error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message describing the error.

nested_items.name: DataFilter
nested_items.description: Selects source tables for the integration using Maxwell filter syntax.
